author: Staff Reporter
text:
In a gruesome incident, a 16-year-old schoolboy allegedly killed his college-going relative at the latter’s residence here for refusing to marry him on Friday.

C. Abirami of Namakkal was pursing her course in a private teacher training college in Budhansandai. Her relative, a Plus One student of Old Ayakudi in Palani in Dindigul district, along with his parents approached the girl’s parents with a marriage proposal. Her parents said that she would like to continue her studies and turned down their proposal. This irked the school boy who decided to take revenge on her.

On Friday afternoon, when Abirami was sleeping in her room, the boy slit her throat with a knife and fled the house.
title: Schoolboy kills college girl for refusing to marry him
